So sim city is getting officially supported offline mode.

Discuss.

It's still a waste of far too much money. First, $50 is a ridiculous price, even though it's less expensive than most modern console games. Second, it's impossible to get started in the game unless you're extremely lucky with the way you build. Third, it's made out to be way better than it is.

Offline mode is good, but why wasn't it done sooner anyway?
